A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning\, but a terrible plot and even more pointless side plot. Rian Johnson seemed more interested in upsetting expectations of the audience than in the story of the characters of this film. In the end I had an unpleasant taste in my mouth that didn't feel like Star Wars. And why put a political message in a Star Wars film\, despite the fact that it destroyed Ray.
